description: The agency is replacing its COVID-specific guidance with general guidance for respiratory viruses that says people should stay home when they are sick.
title: Got COVID? CDC says stay home while you're sick, but drops its 5-day isolation rule

description: A former co-chair of OpenAI, Musk says he invested millions in the AI lab on "false promises" that it would be nonprofit and open-source. OpenAI is now backed by Microsoft.
title: Elon Musk sues OpenAI for choosing profits over 'the benefit of humanity'

description: In a conversation with a few reporters Friday, Haley highlighted her background in accounting, saying, "The accountant in me stretches and stretches and stretches those dollars."
title: Nikki Haley raises $12 million in February as she marches toward Super Tuesday

description: Dune: Part Two is a more exciting and eventful journey than Dune: Part One. But even here, the high points are over too soon, and the movie quickly moves on.
title: Staggering action sequences can't help 'Dune: Part Two' sustain a sense of awe

description: The Cuban jazz artist says she's never felt welcome in Latin pop. That is, until she came to Puerto Rico to record her new album, Alkemi, which expands her sound into R&B, bossa nova and neo-soul.
title: How Daymé Arocena left Cuba and found a freeing new sound in Afro-Caribbean pop

description: A leaked document offers a window into the motivations and concerns of party leaders as they seek to deepen ties with the U.S.
title: As Vietnam grows ties with U.S., a secret directive seeks to gird the Communist Party
